verbose_text: Stat5 phosphorylation was not increased in Cblb -/- CD4 + T cells in response to IL-2 (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), suggesting that Cbl-b regulates Th2 and Th9 cell responses independently of Stat5.
evidence: Stat5 phosphorylation was not increased in Cblb -/-  CD4 +  T cells in response to IL-2 ( XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY ), suggesting that Cbl-b regulates Th2 and Th9 cell responses independently of Stat5
